Description: On I-64 at mile marker 278.4 in the City of Norfolk, near Tidewater Drive, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The west left shoulder and left lane are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-85 at mile marker 15.7 in the County of Mecklenburg, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The north right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 168.7 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The south right shoulder is closed.
